---
title: "SPP for MWIDE"
output: html_notebook
---

```{r}
library(forecast)
library(ggplot2)
library(readr)
```

```{r}
MWIDE <- read_csv("~/R/SPP/CSV/MWIDE.csv", col_types = cols(Week = col_date(format = "%Y-%m-%d")))
mwide <- ts(MWIDE[,2], freq=365.25/7, start=2015+177/365.25)
mwide %>%
  autoplot()
```

```{r}
plot(decompose(mwide))
```

```{r}
training_mwide <- subset(mwide, end=length(mwide)-5)
test_mwide <- subset(mwide, start=length(mwide)-4)
fc_training_mwide<-forecast(training_mwide)
fc_training_mwide %>%
  forecast(h=26) %>%
  autoplot() +autolayer(test_mwide)
```

```{r}
fc_training_mwide
```

```{r}
fc_mwide<-forecast(mwide)
fc_mwide %>%
  forecast(h=26) %>%
  autoplot()
```

```{r}
fc_mwide
```

```{r}
accuracy(fc_mwide)
```

```{r}
tail(mwide)
min(mwide)
max(mwide)
which.min(mwide)
```
